item.title: Lab Telegram Bot on Python
item.description: I created this lab as a challange with myself, to test my communication and teaching skills. The company which I working for, needed an alternative notification system to send hosting alerts. This was an opportunity to introduce bot development to my collegues. The lab is composed of a presentationon slides.com and a code repositoryon github
